code: import React from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{modalImage,closeImageModal,imageModalVisibility}from'../features/imageModalSlice';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ImageModal=function ImageModal(){var isImageModalVisible=useSelector(imageModalVisibility);var image=useSelector(modalImage);var dispatch=useDispatch();var handleCloseModal=function handleCloseModal(){dispatch(closeImageModal());};var getImageUrl=function getImageUrl(image){if(!image){console.error('Invalid image URL:',image);return null;}return image.imageUrl;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image-modal ".concat(isImageModalVisible?'visible':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"image-modal-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"image-header",children:"Clothing Item"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:getImageUrl(image),alt:"selected item in a modal"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"image-close-button",onClick:handleCloseModal,children:"Close"})]})});};export default ImageModal;
